```json
{
  "application": "MLPerf",
  "software": [
    "Singularity",
    "Python",
    "MLPerf",
    "CUDA"
  ],
  "resources": [
    "SLURM",
    "GPU",
    "CPU",
    "Network",
    "Storage"
  ],
  "details": {
    "SLURM": "The script utilizes SLURM (Simple Linux Utility for Resource Management) to manage the execution environment on a cluster.",
    "GPU": "It requests 4 GPUs using the `--gres=gpu:4` flag.",
    "CPU": "It allocates 4 processes across a single node.",
    "Network": "The script appears to use network resources for data access and potentially communication.",
    "Storage": "The script mounts the following directories for data access: `/mnt/isilon/DeepLearning/database/mlperf/v0.6/wmt14_en_de/utf8` (DATADIR), `/cm/local/apps/cuda/libs/current` (CUDA library), `/mnt/driver` (driver directory), and the current working directory as `/mnt/current`."
  }
}
```
